entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023
